author: Special Correspondent
text:
RELIGION

Shree Pattatharasiamman Temple : Thiruppavai chant, Kasthuripalayam Road, Periyanayakam Palayam, 5 a.m.

Thiruvenkatavan Charitable Society: Margazhi Mahotsavam, Sri Venugopalaswamy and Sri KalyanaVenkatesa Perumal Swamy temple, 5.20 a.m.

Bakthi Sorpozhivu Mandram: Villibharatham Discourse, Kongu Nadu Arts and Science College, 6.30 p.m.

GENERAL

Sri Jayendra Saraswathy Maha Vidyalaya College of Arts and Science: Guest lecture, Seminar Hall, college premises, 10.30 a.m.

Bharathiar University: Workshop on Endangered Languages in the Western Ghats of Tamil Nadu, Language Block, 11 a.m.

Vanathotta Malar : 167{+t}{+h} Survey Meeting, Conservator of Forests office, Bharathipark Road, 10 a.m.

Sankara Institute of Management Science: World Dhoti Day, Sankara Campus, Saravanampatti, 10 a.m.

Rajasthani Sangh: Dengue Preventive Medicine, R.S.Puram, 2.30 p.m.

National Blind Association: Mupperum Vizha, Uppilipalayam, 10 a.m.

Karpagam Academy of Higher Education: Interaction Programme on Research and Development, MBA Seminar Hall, 10 a.m.

Nature conservation society: State level wildlife Photographic Exhibition and Workshop, P.K.Das Auditorium, Nehru Arts and Science College, 10.30 a.m.

Kurinji Hospital: Continuing Medical Education Program, Conference Hall, 2 p.m.
title: In Coimbatore Today
